snippet.title: Kriegsfront Tactics Progress Update - January 2024
snippet.description:
After we first released the Kriegsfront Tactics demo on 6 March 2023, we wanted to share some progress updates on things we've been working on.

In our upcoming update, we created an explorable map where players can carefully choose their battles to strategize the next move. We're also developing the Kriegsfront Tactics narrative and further deepening the lore.

We're working on a feature where Kriegers can interact with the environment to destroy jungles or blast through walls to defeat enemies, improving our turn-based cinematics, and more.

We're currently preparing one of our biggest updates. Keep your eyes on, wishlist Kriegsfront Tactics on Steam, follow us on social media to keep yourself updated, and be the first to experience it once it's ready.

- - - - -

Wishlist Kriegsfront Tactics on Steam!
- https://store.steampowered.com/app/1561740/Kriegsfront_Tactics/

Follow Kriegsfront Tactics on Social Media
- https://twitter.com/kriegsfront
- https://www.facebook.com/kriegsfront/
- https://www.instagram.com/kriegsfront/
